text: â€œNdipo miyezi yopatulika ikatha (yomwe njoletsedwa kuchitamo nkhondo), apheni Amushirikina paliponse pamene mwawapeza (menyanani nawo), ndipo agwireni (monga momwe iwo akukuchitirani). Ndipo azungulireni ndi kuwakhalira pa njira zonse. Koma akalapa nayamba kupemphera Swala, ndikupereka chopereka (Zakaat), ilekeni njira yawoyo (asiyeni). Ndithu Allah Ngokhululuka kwambiri, Ngwachisoni chosatha
